plot: Onésime writes romance novels, giving disappointed women back their dreams and desires. Once identified, he becomes the target of a crowd that brings them all together on a hunt, in which the young man takes the place of the old deer.
title: Onésime écrit un roman d'amour
plot_es: Onésime writes romance novels, giving disappointed women back their dreams and desires. Once identified, he becomes the target of a crowd that brings them all together on a hunt, in which the young man takes the place of the old deer.
plot_en: Onésime writes romance novels, giving disappointed women back their dreams and desires. Once identified, he becomes the target of a crowd that brings them all together on a hunt, in which the young man takes the place of the old deer.
